title: Balancer Suspends Protocol After Frontend Exploit
description: An announcement was made to the Balancer community urging them to refrain from interaction with the Balancer user interface until an all-clear notice has been issued.

title: Injective unveils inEVM, bridging the gap between Solana, Cosmos, and Ethereum
description: In an era where blockchain integration is more than a luxury—it’s a necessity, Injective steps up to the plate with a groundbreaking innovation. The company has recently unleashed its inEVM platform, designed as a masterstroke to bridge the once disparate worlds of Solana, Cosmos, and Ethereum. This ambitious endeavor is more than just a technical ... Read more

title: Pioneering Global Summit Spurs Action in Africa’s Tech Frontier
description: Distinguished experts and thought leaders from diverse corners of the world converged for the inaugural “Future of Artificial Intelligence, Automation, and Information Security in Africa Global Summit 2023,” hosted in Livingstone last week. The summit’s principal focus was to set a course toward creating AI solutions tailored precisely to Africa’s unique context. This exclusive report ... Read more

title: Bybit Collaborates With Paradigm to Offer Institutional Clients a Fee-slashing Promotion
description: Bybit and Paradigm have advanced their relations with a new fee-slashing campaign. This promotion is specifically targeted at attracting institutional investors in the crypto ecosystem. Cryptocurrency exchange Bybit has inked a strategic partnership with Paradigm, an institutional liquidity network for crypto derivatives traders.  Together, the duo have adopted a fee-slashing promotion targeted at new and [...]
